original_text: Of the land that we took over at that time, I gave the Reubenites and the Gadites the territory north of Aroer by the Arnon Gorge, including half the hill country of Gilead, together with its towns.
korean_text: 그 때에 우리가 이 땅을 얻으매 아르논 골짜기 곁의 아로엘에서부터 길르앗 산지 절반과 그 성읍들을 내가 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손에게 주었고

sentences.original_text: Of the land that we took over at that time
I gave the Reubenites and the Gadites
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 르우범 사람들과 갓 사람들에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: including half the hill country of Gilead
